comments:
Abolished 1894 and divided between the parishes of Ledbury Urban, 
    Ledbury Rural and Wellington Heath.
Created 1894 out of the parish of Ledbury.
Created 1.4.1968 by renaming the parish of Ledbury Urban.

Created 1894 from the part of the parish of Ledbury in Ledbury 
    Urban District. Renamed 1.4.1968 to become the parish of Ledbury Town.

Abolished 1894 to become the separate parishes of Mathon Urban 
    and Mathon Rural.

Created 1894 from the rural part of the parish of Mathon. Transferred 
    from Worcestershire to Herefordshire on 30.9.1897.

Created 1894 from the part of the parish of Mathon in Malvern 
    Link Urban District. Abolished 31.3.1897 and added to the parish of West 
    Malvern.
Abolished 25.3.1884 and added to the parish of Pixley.
Created 1894 out of the parish of Ledbury.

Created 31.3.1897 out of the parishes of Mathon Urban and Cradley. 
    See also Table 2, notes (f) and (g).
